transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Very good evening sir. Jyoti mein baat kar rahi hai.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Chaitanya baat kar rahe ho sir India Mart se. Actually aapne abhi customer care pe humara call kiya na sir. Bataye kya concern aa raha hai.
Customer: Ha madam mujhe ye check karna hai ki maine abhi kuch tender view kiye the basically India Mart se.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Ha ha. Abhi kaunse tender maine view ke liye purchase kiye the uska mujhe data pata nahi chal raha hai. To mere ko show karna hai matlab wo kahan pe batayega.
Executive: To wo tender ka jo aapne purchase kiya hai na to uski details aapko mail pe mil jati hai. Jo register mail id hoti hai na aapne do tender liya hai sir. Ek liya hua hai Indian army ka karke hai aur ek hai jo hai authentic automatic energy ka kuch hai. Department of automatic energy Maharashtra ki Maharashtra aur Punjab ki. Theek hai and jo baki ki further details hai wo aapko mail pe milti hai sir. To mail aap open karenge na to mail mein aapko sari details mil jayegi to aapko sara pura tender ka jo details hota hai jo file karna hota hai wo aapko milta hai.
Customer: Okay theek hai madam ek baar main mail check kar leta hu agar by mistake wo spam mein hai to main ek baar dekh leta hu otherwise please aap mujhe ek baar reforward kar dena agar possible hai to.
Executive: Ha ha ha ha. Sir nahi forward karne ka access humare end pe to nahi aata hai. Just aap jo tender view karte hai na usi type pe. Ek second rukiye main baat kara deti hu. One second.
Customer: Ha.
Customer: Mujhe actually na mail mila nahi hai aapke end se India Mart se.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Yes mam.
Executive: Sir actually tender ka jo hota hai na jab aap purchase karte hai to baki ki details aapko mail pe mil jati hai tender ke related. Aur humare end pe bas yahi details hoti hai ki aapne tender purchase kiya hua hai and kahan ki tender aapne purchase kiye kis location ki yahi itni details hoti hai. Baki ki details aapke end pe hi hoti hai.
Customer: Theek hai madam main ek baar mail check kar leta hu agar waha pe nahi milta hai to aapke paas jo bhi detail aap mujhe provide kar sakte hai aap please mujhe wo ek baar whatsapp kar dena jo bhi data aapke paas hai wo.
Executive: Main main aapka ye same number whatsapp hai na.
Customer: Yes yes madam.
Executive: Theek hai to main bata deti hu actually sir aapne na jo hai humare end pe jo dikh rahi hai do tender mobile aur baki ki koi bhi details nahi hai. Ek second fir main call pe hi aapke whatsapp pe hi main forward kar de rahi hu. Ek baar whatsapp number sir bolenge aapka.
Customer: 8980
Executive: One second 8980
Customer: 77
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: 8299
Executive: 8299
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Maine aapko whatsapp pe message kiya hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants details of tenders purchased.



Resolution:

- Executive informed details are sent via mail.

- Executive shared details of purchased tenders on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- tender, whatsapp, mail, purchase
